name: Telegram Workflow
description: A self hosted telegram automation app that allows you to create workflows to carry out automations such as forwarding messages.

API_ID.description: You need to provide your Telegram API_ID. Can be found at https://my.telegram.org.

API_HASH.description: You need to provide your Telegram API_HASH. Can be found at https://my.telegram.org.

AUTH_KEY.description: An auto generated unique password that gives you access to the app on your server instance.

PORT.description: The port you want to run your server on. By default it runs on PORT 8080.

VUE_APP_HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter the name of your heroku app. (NOTE: this must be the same name as the 'App name' field above)
